pullRequest.title: NMS-12424: Add OpenBMP integration
pullRequest.bodyText:
This provides a Telemetryd Adapter which integrates with OpenBMP by creating OpenBMP messages and send them off to an external kafka cluster.

JIRA (Issue Tracker): http://issues.opennms.org/browse/NMS-12424

commit.message: NMS-12424: Added OpenBMP messages and adapter skeleton

NMS-12424: Add heartbeat for BMP listener/parser

The TCP parser interface is changed to expose lifecycle handling
methods. The TCP listener calls thes methods on connects/disconnects.
NMS-12424: Serialization and deserialization tests for OpenBMP messages.
Merge branch 'jira/NMS-12424' of github.com:OpenNMS/opennms into jira/NMS-12424
Add a test for the message headers too.

NMS-12424: Add unit test to verify generated OpenBMP messages
from the BmpIntegrationAdapter.
NMS-12424: beginnings of base_attribute message generation
Merge branch 'jira/NMS-12424' of github.com:OpenNMS/opennms into jira/NMS-12424
NMS-12424: Update protobuf to follow style guide.
Merge branch 'jira/NMS-12424' of github.com:OpenNMS/opennms into jira/NMS-12424

NMS-12424: Make it possible to send multiple messages from
a single incoming message.
NMS-12424: Modified test for router messages
NMS-12424: Added test for peer down
NMS-12424: Add "opennms." as a prefix to the topic names.

NMS-12424: Add community path attr. support

Also fix @fooker's test.
NMS-12424: Don't throw exceptions for unsupported path attributes ;)
NMS-12424: Add more missing attribute ids
NMS-12424: More improved path attribute support.

nodes.bodyText: Can we set a fake source rather than keeping it null? I'm thinking host=0.0.0.0 and port=0
I'll revert this once we get the OpenBMP Message API artifact published.
This is what I need to get published.

This seems like a reasonable fix -  only set properties that are writeable - caveat is that it makes it harder to detect mis-configured properties.
If the property is not writeable, maybe we could call some known function on the bean to validate?
TODO: Async DNS resolution. Use address for now and defer to separate JIRA issue?
TODO: Implement not or defer to JIRA?

commit.message: NMS-12424: Use fake address instead of null source
NMS-12424: Added Issue references for TODOs

Revert "NMS-12424: Disable CircleCI for now :)"

This reverts commit c0f9339765f1479dffbab7518a01b92bfa226c32.
